word:
Louder Than Words 

     In obeying the Saviour's injunction, our example will preach louder than words. The highest display of the power of truth is seen when 
                                                                           29
those who profess to believe it give evidence of their faith by their works. Those who believe this solemn truth should possess such a spirit of self-sacrifice as will rebuke the worldly ambition of the money worshiper.
